name: Pinball
overview: Pinball is a Game & Watch game released as a part of the Multi Screen series on December 5, 1983. It is a dual-screen single-player Game & Watch. It opens like a compact, with an upper and lower screen. Hirokazu Tanaka composed the game music. The player controls two flippers on the bottom screen and two on the top screen. Other pinball objects include bumpers, outlanes, rollover lanes, kickbacks and plungers. Pinball was recreated in Game & Watch Gallery 3 for Game Boy Color.
